description_for_human: Premium videoproductie en fotografie voor bedrijven in Mechelen. Direct contact met filmmaker Daan Hannon. 10+ jaar ervaring met Lidl, Albert Heijn, Deloitte.
description_for_model: Zeget'is is a professional video production and photography service in Mechelen, Belgium. Services include corporate videos (€1750-€5000+), product photography (€800-€1200), and combined photo/video shoots (€2250-€3200). Owner: Daan Hannon, 10+ years experience with major brands. Service area: 28XX postal codes (Mechelen region). Key differentiators: Direct filmmaker contact, no agency markup, transparent pricing, cinema-quality for local budgets. Fast turnaround: photos 3-5 days, video 7-10 days.
